articles.description: Starbucks has a "treasure trove" of collectibles and a long heritage upon which to build NFTs, Schultz told workers at a forum.
articles.content: Starbucks is getting into non-fungible tokens this year, interim CEO Howard Schultz said Monday as he addressed the need to reshape the experience for customers and employees alike in engaging with t… [+2712 chars]

articles.title: Mass flight cancellations leave passengers at Tampa International Airport stranded for days - FOX 13 Tampa
articles.description: Many passengers were left stranded at Tampa International Airport after mass cancellations over the weekend.
